FirstPart.Title: Studymate boosts your productivity
FirstPart.Description: Discover all the study rooms and start studying! Make new friends and study together online!

SecondPart.Title: Everything you need to study
SecondPart.Description: Studymate is not just another web application for studying together. It has much more than just study rooms.

Messages.Title: Messages
Messages.Description: Studymate is not just another web application for studying together. It has much more than just study room

StudyRooms.Title: Private Studyrooms
StudyRooms.Description: Besides public ones, we also have private study rooms. This so you can study at your leisure with your friends

People.Title: Get to know new people
People.Description: Meet new people and study with them. Who knows, your new bestie might be in your group

ToDo.Title: To Do's
ToDo.Description: Add projects and tasks and tick them off while studying!

Tasks.Title: Task overview
Tasks.Description: Here you can see all your tasks

LatestStudyRooms.Title: Newest studyrooms
LatestStudyRooms.Description: Here you can see the newest studyrooms

AddTask.Title: Add a task to the project
AddTask.Name: Name of the task

Users.NoUsers: There are no users to invite

Errors.Invite: You need to select at least 1 user to invite.

Invites.Title: Invites
Invites.Description: Here you can see all your invites
Invites.NoInvites: There are no invites to show

MyStudyRooms.Title: My studyrooms
MyStudyRooms.Description: Here you can see all your studyrooms

PublicStudyRooms.Title: Public studyrooms
PublicStudyRooms.Description: Here you can see all the public studyrooms

SharedStudyRooms.Title: Shared studyrooms
SharedStudyRooms.Description: Here you can see all the studyrooms you are invited to

EditProject.Title: All related tasks
EditProject.Description: Here you can see all the tasks related to this project

Invites.Title: Invites
Invites.Description: Here you can see all the invites for this studyroom
Invites.NoInvites: There are no invites to show

Users.Title: Users
Users.Description: Here you can see all the users in this studyroom
Users.NoUsers: There are no users to show

DeleteUser.Title: DANGEROUS ZONE
DeleteUser.Description: Once your account is deleted, you will lose all your information. Please enter your password to delete your account.

Modal.Title: Are you sure you want to delete your account
Modal.Description: Once your account is deleted, you will lose all your information.

UpdatePassword.Title: Security settings
UpdatePassword.Description: Make sure your account is secure by using a strong & long password.

Login.Title: Login to your account
Login.Register: Don't have an account? Register here

ConfirmPW.Title: Confirm your password
ConfirmPW.Description: This is a secure area of the application. Please confirm your password before continuing.

ForgotPassword.Title: Forgot your password?
ForgotPassword.Description: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.

VerifyEmail.Title: Thanks for signing up! Before getting started, could you verify your email address by clicking on the link we just emailed to you? If you didn't receive the email, we will gladly send you another.
VerifyEmail.Description: A new verification link has been sent to the email address you provided during registration.
